item.description:
Job-Seekers’ Boot Camp: Job Hunting for the 40+ with Nancy FredeDate/Time
Date(s) - 03/5/2013
6:30 pm - 8:00 pm
This workshop will focus on helping those 40 and over who have been unemployed for a while, are underemployed, or are interested in changing jobs. It will give tips on resumes, cover letters, networking and volunteering ideas, and job search techniques. Nancy Frede, a career coach and counselor, will be the presenter.
This program is funded by a generous gift from the Friends of the Library. Registration is recommended, but not required. To register, sign up below or call 860-584-7787 x2017.

group.name: The West Hartford Over 40 Fun Bunch!

item.name: Job-Seekers’ Boot Camp: Job Hunting for the 40+ Bristol Public Library
